attributes.action: Force supermarkets to submit shopping trolleys to a yearly MOT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All supermarket trolleys should have a yearly MOT for aisle worthiness. We can take our overweight policemen and women out of their cars to patrol supermarkets and issue on the spot fines for any trolleys that veer to the side or have that one wobbly wheel. This could save the country millions in reducing sick days through trolley injuries and trolley rage.
